description: The Female Farmer, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the  Woman,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2 and  Ear of Rice emojis. These are
apple_vendor_description: The woman farmer emoji with a light skin tone on Apple devices is portrayed with a friendly, competent expression and practical attire, including a hat and sturdy clothing. Apple's meticulous design brings her to life with realistic textures, subtle shading, and soft rounded edges, conveying a sense of natural connection and hard work. This emoji is perfect for representing agricultural work, gardening, sustainable living, or anyone involved in cultivating the land, embodying a spirit of growth and nourishment.
